gemini-2.0-flash.notes: Generally available, better quality than 1.5 Flash at same speed and cost

gemini-2.5-flash-exp.notes: Experimental model, free during preview period

gemini-2.5-pro.notes: State-of-the-art multipurpose model, implicit caching provides 75% discount on cached tokens

gemini-2.5-flash.notes: Best price/performance model, 1M token context, implicit caching provides 75% discount
